
## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [onNewSubscriptionRules(topicName, subscriptionName, providedRules, subscriptionProvision)](./nesbus.sbmanagementdefaultsadapter.onnewsubscriptionrules.md) | A function that can be used to create default set of rules that will be added when a new subscription is created. This function, when set, is fired at all time even if the user defined a static array or a dynamic function for the rules.<!-- -->If the user provision defines a function for the rules it will be fired first and after that the default rules function will fire.<!-- -->The rules from the user's provision is passed to this function and the result from this function will be used as the resolved rules for the subscription. I.E., for pass-through make sure you return the \`<!-- -->providedRules array. |
